requirements.title: BLOCKING: Multipage navigation UI architecture (ADR-013)

requirements.title: CRITICAL: 1,600+ prompt template combinations (ADR-020)

requirements.title: PARTIAL: 128K context with FP8 optimization (ADR-021)

requirements.title: MISSING: Type-safe multi-format export system (ADR-022)
requirements.description: COMPLETE ADR VIOLATION: Export functionality entirely absent from current implementation, violating ADR-022 requirement for type-safe export with Pydantic models supporting JSON, Markdown, PDF, and Rich console formats with Jinja2 templates
requirements.implementation_notes: ❌ COMPLETE ADR-022 VIOLATION: Export functionality completely absent from current implementation - fundamental requirement missing
blocking_factors: No multi-format support (JSON, Markdown, PDF, Rich console)
Missing Jinja2 template system for output formatting
No export progress indicators or batch processing

requirements.title: MISSING: Parallel document analysis modes (ADR-023)
requirements.description: COMPLETE ADR VIOLATION: Analysis mode selection entirely absent from current implementation, violating ADR-023 requirement for DocumentAnalysisModeManager with separate/combined/auto modes, parallel processing with 3-5x speedup, and result aggregation
requirements.implementation_notes: ❌ COMPLETE ADR-023 VIOLATION: Analysis mode functionality completely absent - fundamental parallel processing requirement missing
blocking_factors: No analysis mode selection interface whatsoever
Missing result aggregation and cross-document comparison
No processing status indicators for multiple documents
